page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are no major indusries in our block although unemployment is very low.Farming is the main industry in the area and most of the farms follow on from one generation to another.The Forestry Comission employ a number of people in the area as well. There is a publishing Company at Talybont -Y Lolfa and 12 local people are employed.There are two Hotels which employ between them 9 local people . The local garage employs four mechanics and there are 5 people employed at the school. That is all the local employment available and people have to travell to the nearest town Aberystwyth to find work, many working at the University, College of Librarians, or the Agricultural College. There are also quite a number working at the Plant Breeding Station at Bow Street.
